Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the bradykinin-related peptide family
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Causes constriction on isolated rat ileum preparations and relaxation on rat duodenum muscle preparations at amounts higher than bradykinin. Is a partial agonist bradykinin receptor B2 (BDKRB2). Has insecticidal propertieS. May be related to the predation of insects by the spider webS. ##Miscellaneous

Literature.Title: Multiple bradykinin-related peptides from the capture web of thespider Nephila clavipes (Araneae, Tetragnatidae).
Literature.Author: Volsi E.C. , Mendes M. A., Marques M. R., dos Santos L.D., Santos K.S. , de Souza B.M. , Babieri E.F., Palma M. S.
